article.headline: Troy 92, South Alabama 88 OT
article.story: MOBILE, Ala. (AP) -- Richard Chaney scored a 3-pointer with 39.7 seconds to play and Justin Jonus scored two as the seconds ticked off to force overtime Saturday night as Troy went on to upset league champion South Alabama 92-88. O'Darien Bassett scored 25 points, 18 after halftime, as the Trojans earned the No. 8 seed to host Middle Tennessee Wednesday night in the first round of the Sun Belt Conference Tournament. The Trojans (13-16, 8-10) trailed 75-65 with 3:59 to play, but Chaney's 3-pointer and Jonus' pair with 22.6 seconds and 5.0 seconds left forced the extra session. The teams played to a 35-35 tie over the first 20 minutes with neither team pulling away. South Alabama (20-10) gained its biggest advantage, 14-9, at the 12:14 mark. Daon Merritt led the Jaguars with 19 points while Ernest Little posted his sixth double-double of the season with 14 points and 11 rebounds. The Jaguars shot 51.9 percent from the field in the opening half and held a 20-10 rebounding advantage. Troy stayed close by hitting 45.2 percent from the field and committing just four turnovers. Chaney and Sammy Sharp hit shots in the first three minutes of overtime, then Sharp connected again with 1:45 left to put Troy up 84-78. From there, Troy hit all eight free throws to hang on for the victory.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
